content: discover the elegance of a lacy v_stitch scarf beautifully soft and lightweight crafted with dk weight yarn this project uses only beginner-friendly stitches double_crochet double_crochet and chain stitches chain the pattern allows for easy customization in length and width using the included stitch multiple making it perfect for creating a personalized summer accessory skill level advanced beginner crochet pattern sizes 8 inches wide x 61 inches long additional instructions to make this into a shawl width are included languages available english **materials** required yarn king cole finesse cotton silk dk category #3 dk yardage between 312 and 312 yards meterage between 285 29 and 285 29 meters hooks us 8 0 - 5 mm gauges 12 stitches x 7 row = 4 inches in v_stitch **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
